CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 7, 1940, pg. 8, reads: "The Last Days of Summer Socially Gay...Beauty...Exotic Elegance...Charm...Fashion...In Abundance Here - Beautiful visitors to fair Pittsburgh are Mrs. Cordella Wharton, right, and Mrs. Lillian Berry (the former Misses Murdocks), of Washington and Baltimore, respectively. They are guests of the R. L. Vanns. - Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Lillian Murdocks Berry wearing light colored gown and Cordella Wharton wearing dark gown with large flower on bodice and lace shawl, posed next to piano in living room of Vann home
